pages.text: This butterfly can only be found on $(#00d5e0)the highest frozen peaks$(). A player can lure the White fox towards them using $(#00d5e0)Lily of the valley$(). When put into a bottle, the white fox will occationally spawn $(#00d5e0)patches of snow$() around it.
pages.title: White Fox

pages.wings_caption: The wings of the White fox butterfly have the same brewing capabilities as $(#00d5e0)sugar.$()
pages.butterfly_caption: The soft, snowy wings of the butterfly leave snowflakes in its trail.
